title: Test SummarizationMiddleware context overflow
description: Create test scenarios that exceed 170k token context limit. Verify SummarizationMiddleware automatically summarizes conversation history. Test agent continues functioning after summarization.

title: Install and configure deepagents v0.3.4
description: Add deepagents library to pyproject.toml dependencies. Configure integration with existing LangGraph agents. Set up TodoListMiddleware, FilesystemMiddleware, SubAgentMiddleware, and SummarizationMiddleware. Test compatibility with current multi-agent architecture.

title: Research CompositeBackend configuration patterns
description: Study deepagents backend architecture. Research StateBackend, FilesystemBackend, StoreBackend, and CompositeBackend. Design routing strategy for /memories/ path vs ephemeral paths.

title: Migrate supervisor agent to deepagents
description: Refactor supervisor agent to use create_deep_agent(). Preserve existing routing logic, sub-agent delegation, and A2A protocol compatibility. Test with existing platform engineer integration.

title: Document custom deepagent functionality
description: Document any custom features, extensions, or modifications in the local deepagent implementation that don't exist in LangChain deepagents. Identify what can be replicated using custom middleware, tools, or backends.

title: Review and finalize ADR
description: Review ADR draft with team. Incorporate feedback. Add diagrams if needed. Update README.md in docs/docs/changes/ with ADR entry. Mark ADR status appropriately.

title: Implement beads (bd) issue tracking in ai-platform-engineering
description: Integrate beads (bd) for git-native issue tracking and project management in the ai-platform-engineering repository. Setup includes: .beads/ directory with configuration, metadata, and JSONL storage; configure sync workflow with git; onboard team members; document usage in README; establish workflow rules for creating, updating, and syncing issues.

title: Install and configure spec-kit
description: Install spec-kit from https://github.com/github/spec-kit. Set up directory structure: specs/, memory/, templates/. Configure spec-kit commands (/speckit.specify, /speckit.plan, /speckit.task). Verify integration with existing tooling.

title: Test beads PR workflow and merge
description: Review and test the beads implementation PR (feat/add-beads-issue-tracking). Ensure all files are properly configured. Test bd sync workflow. Merge PR after approval and verify remote tracking works correctly.

title: Set up feature specification templates
description: Create feature spec template with sections: Requirements, User Stories, Acceptance Criteria, Success Metrics. Include [NEEDS CLARIFICATION] markers pattern. Add checklists for requirement completeness. Enforce separation of WHAT/WHY from HOW. Test template with sample feature.

title: Create constitution.md with architectural principles
description: Draft constitution.md based on spec-kit Article system. Define: Library-First Principle, CLI Interface Mandate, Test-First Imperative, Simplicity Gates, Anti-Abstraction Rules, Integration-First Testing. Adapt to ai-platform-engineering architecture (multi-agent, LangGraph, A2A protocol). Document amendment process.

title: Review GitLab agent PR #580
description: Review and test PR #580: feat: add gitlab agent. Verify implementation follows agent patterns (LangGraph, A2A protocol). Check MCP integration, tool definitions, error handling, and documentation. Test with GitLab API operations. Provide feedback and approve if ready.

title: Draft ADR for deepagents migration
description: Write initial draft of ADR in docs/docs/changes/. Include: context, decision, rationale, consequences, alternatives considered. Document built-in middleware benefits and trade-offs from local implementation.

title: Integrate HITL workflows with interrupt_on
description: Configure human-in-the-loop workflows using deepagents interrupt_on parameter. Identify sensitive tools that require approval. Set up checkpointer and allowed_decisions configuration. Test approval/edit/reject workflows for critical operations.

title: Create beads onboarding documentation
description: Write documentation for team onboarding with beads. Include: installation instructions, bd onboard walkthrough, common workflows (creating issues, dependencies, labels), best practices, and troubleshooting. Add to docs/ or README.md.

title: Document SDD workflow for team
description: Write team documentation for spec-kit adoption. Cover: specification → planning → tasking workflow, /speckit.* commands, constitutional principles, integration with conventional commits and DCO, ADR creation from specs. Add examples. Update CONTRIBUTING.md or create docs/SDD-WORKFLOW.md.

title: Document beads usage in workspace rules
description: Update workspace .cursorrules to include beads workflow instructions. Document bd commands (onboard, ready, show, update, close, sync). Add examples of creating issues, managing dependencies, and syncing with git. Include in 'Landing the Plane' section.

title: Investigate deepagent_cli capabilities
description: Research and document the deepagent_cli tool features. Understand how it provides interactive command-line interface with skills, memory, and HITL workflows. Evaluate if it can replace or enhance our current agent CLI approach. Reference: https://github.com/langchain-ai/deepagents

title: Write unit tests for deepagents integration
description: Create unit tests for agent initialization, middleware configuration, and tool execution. Test custom tools integration, backend operations, and error handling. Achieve >80% code coverage.

title: Configure default middleware stack
description: Set up and configure TodoListMiddleware, FilesystemMiddleware, SubAgentMiddleware, and SummarizationMiddleware. Test each middleware component independently. Document configuration options and behavior.

title: Audit current local deepagent usage
description: Scan codebase for all imports and usages of local deepagent library. Document all files, classes, and functions that depend on it. Create inventory of custom functionality that needs to be preserved or migrated.

title: Integration testing with multi-agent system
description: Test deepagents integration with existing supervisor and platform engineer agents. Verify sub-agent delegation using task() tool works with current architecture. Test TodoListMiddleware execution plans. Verify SummarizationMiddleware handles context overflow (170k tokens). Run full integration test suite.

title: Create ADR for deepagents integration
description: Write Architecture Decision Record in docs/docs/changes/ documenting the migration from local deepagent to LangChain deepagents. Include rationale, benefits (TodoListMiddleware, FilesystemMiddleware, SubAgentMiddleware, HITL), trade-offs, and implementation approach. Follow ADR template from .cursorrules.

title: Adopt spec-kit for Specification-Driven Development
description: Implement GitHub's spec-kit methodology for SDD workflow. Setup: install spec-kit, create specs/ directory structure, configure templates (feature specs, implementation plans), establish constitution.md with architectural principles. Define workflow: PRD creation → implementation planning → code generation. Integrate with existing agent development process. Reference: https://github.com/github/spec-kit/blob/main/spec-driven.md

title: Configure beads sync branch
description: Set up beads sync-branch configuration in .beads/config.yaml for team collaboration. Ensure all team members use the same branch for bd sync operations. Document the sync workflow in project README or CONTRIBUTING.md.

title: Create pilot spec for existing agent feature
description: Select a small agent feature (e.g., ArgoCD pagination). Write feature specification using spec-kit methodology. Generate implementation plan with /speckit.plan. Create tasks with /speckit.task. Validate workflow end-to-end. Document lessons learned.

title: Implement CompositeBackend for hybrid memory
description: Configure CompositeBackend to route specific paths to different storage backends. Set up StoreBackend for /memories/ path to enable persistent memory across conversations. Implement StateBackend for ephemeral working files. Test long-term memory capabilities for user preferences and knowledge bases.

title: Migrate domain agents (ArgoCD, AWS, Jira, GitHub)
description: Refactor ArgoCD, AWS, Jira, and GitHub agents to use create_deep_agent(). Configure custom tools alongside built-in tools. Ensure MCP server integration still works. Test pagination and OOM protection.

title: Migrate agents to use deepagents create_deep_agent
description: Refactor existing agents to use create_deep_agent() API. Configure custom tools, system prompts, middleware, and backends. Leverage built-in tools (write_todos, read_todos, ls, read_file, write_file, edit_file, glob, grep, execute, task). Ensure A2A protocol compatibility is maintained.

title: Integrate LangChain deepagents v0.3.4
description: Migrate from local deepagent implementation to official LangChain deepagents library. Deep Agents provides planning tools, filesystem backend, sub-agent delegation, and built-in middleware for complex agentic tasks. Key features: TodoListMiddleware, FilesystemMiddleware, SubAgentMiddleware, SummarizationMiddleware, and HITL workflows.

title: Identify sensitive tools requiring approval
description: Audit all tools and identify operations that need human approval (e.g., destructive operations, external API calls, cost-incurring actions). Create list with approval decision types (approve/edit/reject).

title: Add deepagents to pyproject.toml dependencies
description: Update pyproject.toml to include deepagents v0.3.4 and required dependencies (tavily-python if needed). Run uv lock and uv sync. Verify installation and imports work correctly.

title: Set up implementation plan templates
description: Create implementation plan template with: Phase -1 Gates (Simplicity, Anti-Abstraction, Integration-First), File Creation Order, Test-First workflow, Complexity Tracking. Integrate with existing ADR process in docs/docs/changes/. Add constitutional compliance checkpoints.

title: Test deepagent_cli interactive features
description: Install and test the deepagent_cli tool. Explore skills, memory management, and human-in-the-loop workflows. Document CLI commands, options, and integration points. Compare with agent-chat-cli.

title: Run integration tests for multi-agent workflows
description: Execute full integration test suite with migrated agents. Test supervisor → platform engineer → domain agent flow. Verify A2A protocol streaming, artifact handling, and execution plans work correctly.

title: Implement persistent memory backend
description: Configure CompositeBackend with StoreBackend for /memories/ path using LangGraph Store. Set up StateBackend as default for ephemeral files. Test cross-conversation persistence.

title: Migrate platform engineer agent to deepagents
description: Refactor platform engineer agent to use create_deep_agent(). Update to use built-in task() tool for sub-agent delegation. Maintain execution plan and TODO-based workflow.

title: Configure interrupt_on with checkpointer
description: Set up interrupt_on configuration for sensitive tools. Configure LangGraph checkpointer for HITL workflows. Implement approval/edit/reject decision handling. Test interrupt and resume flows.

title: Create proof-of-concept agent with create_deep_agent
description: Build a simple POC agent using create_deep_agent() to validate integration. Test built-in tools (write_todos, ls, read_file, write_file). Verify it works with LangGraph streaming and state management.

title: Remove local deepagent library
description: Audit and remove local deepagent implementation from the codebase. Identify all dependencies and usages before removal. Document any custom functionality that needs to be migrated to the new deepagents library.
